Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about outdoor lighting

Not by much. Our systems use low-voltage, energy-efficient LED fixtures that are designed to run at minimal cost. On average, a full lighting system may cost just a few dollars per month to operate.

No. We take great care in minimizing disruption. Most trenching is shallow and done with precision tools. After installation, we clean up and restore the area so it looks as if we were never there.

Yes! We offer a 20-year manufacturer warranty on all fixtures and transformers. System controls are covered by the manufacturer's warranty. Labor is not included.

That's no problem. Our designs are modular and easily expandable, so we can add more lights down the road without starting from scratch.

Very little. LEDs are long-lasting, and our systems are built to handle the elements. If something ever needs adjusting or replacing, we're just a call away. We also offer service visits for system checkups.

Absolutely. We offer multiple control options, including simple dusk-to-dawn timers, digital smart timers, and app-controlled systems for full remote access.

Most residential jobs are completed in 1–2 days, depending on size and complexity. We'll give you a clear timeline before we begin.

Not necessarily. As long as we have access to the areas we're working on and power for the transformer, we can get everything installed while you're away.

Not at all. We use professional-grade fixtures with warm-toned LEDs and design each system to create a natural, elegant glow — never harsh or overbearing.

Just book your free consultation! We'll walk your property, discuss your goals, and provide a custom design and quote — no pressure.

Still have questions? We're here to help!
